segments.text: What do we have for the dinner now ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: It is said that greens can improve our metabolism . In addition , I want to keep fit .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Where is my favorite white bread ? Is it in refrigerator ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I didn't buy any of it at all . Most health food are good for you , but don't taste good .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Do you prepare some dessert for me ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I am clear about your sweet tooth , so I made a mixed fruit dish for you .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Are you trying to change our eating patterns ?
segments.speaker: S2
